item.title: iSwear Jar
item.description: The iSwear Jar gives you the power to create or destroy any habit. Simply imagine a dollar bill being thinly sliced by a paper shredder, turning cool cash into green slivers… Then imagine that dollar bill was yours, and that you surrendered it as a penalty for slipping upâ€¦
